links.title: Tesla Semi prototype spotted driving in the wild in great new sighting
links.description: Recent reservations show that demand for Tesla Semi, the company's new electric semi truck program, is high and now the automaker needs to deliver. Tesla has a few prototypes and test mules in its test program and one of them was spotted out in the wild.

links.title: Goldman upgrades Walmart and names it one of the bank's favorite stocks on the tax cut
links.description: Daniel Acker | Bloomberg | Getty Images Walmart's stock will thrive from a stronger retail environment and tax reform, according to Goldman Sachs. The firm on Thursday raised its rating for Walmart shares to buy from neutral and added the retailer to its "Americas Conviction List."

links.title: AlgoWins
links.description: The tool indicates "Short Confidence" How much skin are Short sellers willing to risk? Since we used to have an algorithm call the data daily.. this simplified things and was made available to the public combining the Q,N,Z - TRF reports. Link of interest regarding short sale transparency http://www.sec.gov/news/press/2009/2009-172.htm Data generated with an SRO report.

links.title: House passes stopgap spending bill, but Democrats may block in Senate
links.description: The House passed a short-term spending bill late Thursday in at attempt to avert a government shutdown, but the bill still faces a major hurdle in the Senate, where it is scheduled to be voted on later Thursday night.

messages.body: $TSLA House votes to avert federal shutdown, Senate chances dim https://finance.yahoo.com/news/white-house-official-trump-immigration-views-evolved-053937226--politics.html?soc_src=social-sh&soc_trk=tw via @YahooFinance

links.title: House votes to avert federal shutdown, Senate chances dim
links.description: WASHINGTON (AP) -- A divided House voted Thursday to prevent a government shutdown after an eleventh-hour deal brought conservatives aboard. But the GOP-written measure faced gloomy prospects in the Senate, and it remained unclear whether lawmakers would be able to find a way to keep federal offices open past a Friday night deadline.

messages.body: $TSLA sold my calls around noon, glad I did. will buy back later.
$TSLA House passes bill to avoid a government shutdown. Now comes the hard part https://www.cnbc.com/2018/01/18/house-has-the-votes-to-avoid-a-government-shutdown-now-comes-the-hard-part.html

links.title: House has the votes to avoid a government shutdown. Now comes the hard part
links.description: The House had the votes a last-minute bill to avoid a government shutdown Thursday night, set to send it to the Senate where it faces a higher hurdle on the way to President Donald Trump's desk. Majority House Republican leaders had to keep their members in line in order to approve the short-term spending legislation.
